DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior Exposure Antineoplastic Enzyme Inhibitor Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response for question addressing prior exposure to antineoplastic enzyme inhibitors specifically target tumor cells by targeting enzymes that are not normally expressed or are minimally expressed in normal, healthy tissues as outline in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Prior Exposure Antineoplastic Enzyme Inhibitor Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Earlier in time or order._The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience._Any agent that specifically inhibits a particular enzyme that is overexpressed and/or mutated in cancer cell pathways. Antineoplastic enzyme inhibitors specifically target tumor cells by targeting enzymes that are not normally expressed or are minimally expressed in normal, healthy tissues._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Prior Exposure Antineoplastic Enzyme Inhibitor Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.:Any agent that specifically inhibits a particular enzyme that is overexpressed and/or mutated in cancer cell pathways. Antineoplastic enzyme inhibitors specifically target tumor cells by targeting enzymes that are not normally expressed or are minimally expressed in normal, healthy tissues.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

Any agent that specifically inhibits a particular enzyme that is overexpressed and/or mutated in cancer cell pathways. Antineoplastic enzyme inhibitors specifically target tumor cells by targeting enzymes that are not normally expressed or are minimally expressed in normal, healthy tissues.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient had prior exposur
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior exposure to any PI3K, AKT or mTOR inhibitors?
